attributes.action: Stop the mixing of Tutors at Chamberlayne College for the Arts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to stop the tutors mixing we have year 7 tutors year 8 tutors year 9 tutors year 10 tutors and year 11 tutors but now they want to mix us with a bit of all years in the same tutor!

this will not work so we need to put a stop to it now!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
